name: Kabin Kyoto
description: Conveniently situated in the centre of Kyoto, KABIN Kyoto provides air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation features a concierge service, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Featuring a private bathroom with a bidet and free toiletries, certain rooms at KABIN Kyoto also offer a city view. At the accommodation each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish, French and Japanese, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed. Popular points of interest near KABIN Kyoto include Gion Shijo Station, Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall and Sanjusangen-do Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 45 km from the hotel.

name: Waka Kyoto Kawaramachi Hotel
description: Situated in Kyoto, 500 metres from Gion Shijo Station and 1.8 km from the centre, 花築京都河原町ホテル Floral Hotel Kyoto Kawaramachi features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a shared lounge. The aparthotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hairdryer and bidet. A fridge and microwave are also available, as well as a kettle. A bicycle rental service is available at 花築京都河原町ホテル Floral Hotel Kyoto Kawaramachi, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Samurai Kembu Kyoto, Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall and Sanjusangen-do Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 45 km from 花築京都河原町ホテル Floral Hotel Kyoto Kawaramachi.

name: Omo5 Kyoto Gion By Hoshino Resorts
description: No description found

name: Oakwood Hotel Oike Kyoto
description: Conveniently located in the heart of Kyoto, Oakwood Hotel Oike Kyoto is your perfect stay while exploring the culture and history in Kyoto. The hotel is a mere six-minute walk to Karasuma Oike Station and a two-minute walk to Kyoto Shiyakusho-mae Station, and just a fifteen-minute train ride from Kyoto Station. Oakwood Hotel Oike Kyoto offers a total of 120 guests’ accommodation – 104 well-appointed hotel rooms with plush beds, and 16 studio apartments with fully-equipped kitchen including a refrigerator, microwave oven, cooking utensils, washing machine, dryer, and more.Official Hotel Information

name: Marufukuro
description: Featuring a shared lounge, a restaurant as well as a bar, Marufukuro is located in the centre of Kyoto, 1 km from Sanjusangen-do Temple. Located around 1.1 km from TKP Garden City Kyoto, the hotel with free WiFi is also 1.4 km away from Kyoto Station. Certain rooms at the property include a terrace with a city view. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Selected rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a microwave. At Marufukuro each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. American and Asian breakfast options are available daily at the accommodation. Speaking English and Japanese at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help. Popular points of interest near Marufukuro include Gion Shijo Station, Kiyomizu-dera Temple and Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 44 km from the hotel.

name: Gion Elite Terrace
description: Located in Kyoto, 800 metres from Gion Shijo Station, Gion Elite Terrace provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The hotel features a sauna, a concierge service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Guest rooms at Gion Elite Terrace are equipped with a seating area. A buffet, continental or Asian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The accommodation provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near Gion Elite Terrace include Samurai Kembu Kyoto, Kiyomizu-dera Temple and Shoren-in Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from the hotel.

name: Mimaru Kyoto Nishinotoin Takatsuji
description: Set in the Shimogyo Ward district in Kyoto, MIMARU KYOTO NISHINOTOIN TAKATSUJI offers 4-star rooms with free WiFi. The property is located 1.9 km from TKP Garden City Kyoto, 2.3 km from Nijo Castle and 2.8 km from Sanjusangen-do Temple. The property is 700 metres from the city centre and 400 metres from Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At MIMARU KYOTO NISHINOTOIN TAKATSUJI all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Kyoto International Manga Museum, Kyoto Station and Gion Shijo Station. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 44 km from MIMARU KYOTO NISHINOTOIN TAKATSUJI.

name: Stay Sakura Kyoto Tambaguchi

name: Toyoko Inn Kyoto Shijo-omiya
description: Situated conveniently in Kyoto, Toyoko Inn Kyoto Shijo-omiya offers a buffet breakfast and free WiFi. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. Nijo Castle is 1.7 km from the hotel and Gion Shijo Station is 2.2 km away. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units will provide guests with a fridge. Speaking English, Japanese, Korean and Chinese at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall is 1.3 km from Toyoko Inn Kyoto Shijo-omiya, while Kyoto International Manga Museum is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 44 km from the accommodation.

name: Stay Sakura Kyoto Suzaku Oji
description: Well set in the Nakagyo Ward district of Kyoto, Stay SAKURA Kyoto SUZAKU OJI is located 2.2 km from Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall, 2 km from Kyoto International Manga Museum and 3.1 km from Gion Shijo Station. Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 700 metres from the city centre and 1.3 km from Nijo Castle. All units at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a kitchenette. At Stay SAKURA Kyoto SUZAKU OJI every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Staff speak English and Japanese at the reception. Kyoto Station is 3.7 km from the accommodation, while TKP Garden City Kyoto is 3.9 km away. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 45 km from Stay SAKURA Kyoto SUZAKU OJI.

name: Stay Sakura Kyoto Matsuri
description: No description found

name: Stay Sakura Kyoto Fuga
description: Set in Kyoto, 1.6 km from Tofuku-ji Temple and 3.7 km from the centre, Stay SAKURA Kyoto Fuga offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a garden. Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bidet and slippers. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a kettle. The aparthotel offers a terrace. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. TKP Garden City Kyoto is 2 km from Stay SAKURA Kyoto Fuga, while Fushimi Inari Taisha Shrine is 1.6 km away. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 42 km from the accommodation.

name: Sunrise Suites
description: Sunrise Suites is located in Kyoto, a 5-minute walk from Toji Station. Guests can explore Toji Temple, just a 4-minute walk from the property. Each room is fitted with a flat-screen TV, kitchenette and dining table. A washing machine and dryer are provided as well. The bathrooms are equipped with a bath, slippers and free toiletries. Yukata robes and Japanese tea are provided in each room. Rengeo-in Sanjusangendo, a Buddhist temple, is a 10-minute drive from the accommodation. Kiyomizu-dera Temple is a 20-minute drive from Sunrise Suites. Kansai International Airport is approximately 90-minutes away via train.

name: Tokyu Stay Kyoto Sanjo-Karasuma
description: Well located in the centre of Kyoto, Tokyu Stay Kyoto Sanjo-Karasuma provides buffet breakfast and free WiFi. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The property is non-smoking and is located 400 metres from Kyoto International Manga Museum. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a fridge, a microwave, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. At the hotel each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Tokyu Stay Kyoto Sanjo-Karasuma include Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall, Nijo Castle and Samurai Kembu Kyoto. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Muso
description: Well located in the centre of Kyoto, Hotel Muso provides American breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. Popular points of interest nearby include Kiyomizu-dera Temple, TKP Garden City Kyoto and Kyoto International Manga Museum. The property is non-smoking and is located less than 1 km from Gion Shijo Station. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Rooms come with a kettle, while selected rooms come with a kitchen with a microwave, a minibar and a stovetop. At Hotel Muso each room has bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers 3-star accommodation with a hot tub. Popular points of interest near Hotel Muso include Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall, Sanjusangen-do Temple and Samurai Kembu Kyoto. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 45 km from the hotel.

name: Stay Sakura Kyoto Gion North
description: Stay SAKURA Kyoto Gion North has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Kyoto, 400 metres from Samurai Kembu Kyoto, 1.1 km from Heian Shrine and less than 1 km from Shoren-in Temple. Free WiFi is availablethroughout the property. Each unit features a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bidet and slippers. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a kettle. Gion Shijo Station is 1.2 km from the aparthotel, while Eikan-do Zenrin-ji Temple is 2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 47 km from Stay SAKURA Kyoto Gion North.

name: Tune Stay Kyoto
description: Located in Kyoto and with Kyoto Station reachable within 500 metres, TUNE STAY KYOTO provides concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a shared kitchen and luggage storage space. The property is 1.9 km from the city centre and 500 metres from TKP Garden City Kyoto. Selected rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a fridge, a microwave and a stovetop. At the hotel each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Sanjusangen-do Temple is 1.7 km from TUNE STAY KYOTO, while Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 43 km from the accommodation.

name: Miro Kyoto Nijo Hotel
description: Conveniently located in the Nakagyo Ward district of Kyoto, Miro京都二条城ホテル is set 1.7 km from Kyoto International Manga Museum, 2 km from Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall and 3.2 km from Kitano Tenmangu Shrine. Featuring a shared lounge, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is less than 1 km from Nijo Castle, and within 600 metres of the city centre. At the hotel, each room includes a desk. All rooms are fitted with a kettle, while some rooms also offer a kitchen with a stovetop. All guest rooms in Miro京都二条城ホテル are fitted with a TV and free toiletries. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an Asian breakfast. Samurai Kembu Kyoto is 3.5 km from Miro京都二条城ホテル, while Gion Shijo Station is 3.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 45 km from the hotel.

name: nol kyoto sanjo
description: Featuring a garden, a shared lounge as well as a bar, nol kyoto sanjo is located in the centre of Kyoto, 600 metres from Kyoto International Manga Museum. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from Gion Shijo Station. Guest rooms at the hotel include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, Blu-ray player, and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At nol kyoto sanjo each room comes with bed linen and towels. Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall is 1.4 km from the accommodation, while Samurai Kembu Kyoto is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from nol kyoto sanjo.

name: Stay Sakura Kyoto Tsubaki
description: Situated in Kyoto, 2.4 km from Kyoto Station and 3 km from the centre, Stay SAKURA Kyoto TSUBAKI features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a shared lounge. Each unit features a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bidet and slippers. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also available, as well as a kettle. TKP Garden City Kyoto is 2.5 km from the aparthotel, while Sanjusangen-do Temple is 3.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 42 km from Stay SAKURA Kyoto TSUBAKI.

name: West Japan Kyoto Kiyomizu
description: Set in the Higashiyama Ward district in Kyoto, West Japan Kyoto Kiyomizu offers 1-star rooms with free WiFi. The property is around 1.5 km from Shoren-in Temple, 2.5 km from Heian Shrine and 2.7 km from TKP Garden City Kyoto. The property is non-smoking and is located less than 1 km from Kiyomizu-dera Temple. The units come with air conditioning, a fridge, a microwave, a kettle, a bidet, a hairdryer and a desk. Guest rooms feature a private bathroom, slippers and bed linen. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Gion Shijo Station, Sanjusangen-do Temple and Samurai Kembu Kyoto. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 45 km from West Japan Kyoto Kiyomizu.

name: Jisco Hotel Kyoto Goshonishi
description: Located in Kyoto, less than 1 km from Kyoto International Manga Museum and 1.8 km from the centre, RESI STAY Jisco Hotel Kyoto Goshonishi provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a garden. Private parking is available on site. The apartment offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with slippers, a hair dryer and bidet. A fridge and kettle are also provided. A continental breakfast is available daily at RESI STAY Jisco Hotel Kyoto Goshonishi. A bicycle rental service is available at the accommodation. Kyoto Imperial Palace is 1.7 km from RESI STAY Jisco Hotel Kyoto Goshonishi, while Nijo Castle is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 47 km from the apartment.

name: Hauza Kyoto Gojo-Karasuma
description: Providing free WiFi, HAUZA KYOTO Gojo Karasuma is located in Kyoto, 1.8 km from Kyoto International Manga Museum and 1.9 km from Sanjusangen-do Temple. The property is situated 2.3 km from Kiyomizu-dera Temple. The property is non-smoking and is set 3 km from Samurai Kembu Kyoto. At the hotel, rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Certain rooms will provide you with a kitchen with a stovetop. The units come with a seating area. HAUZA KYOTO Gojo Karasuma offers a terrace. Tofuku-ji Temple is 3.3 km from the accommodation, while Nijo Castle is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 47 km from HAUZA KYOTO Gojo Karasuma.

name: Glanz Kei Kyoto Station
description: Attractively located in the Minami Ward district of Kyoto, GLANZ KEI Kyoto Station is situated 1.1 km from TKP Garden City Kyoto, 2.1 km from Sanjusangen-do Temple and 3 km from Tofuku-ji Temple. With a shared lounge, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 2.7 km from the city centre and 1.1 km from Kyoto Station. All rooms are fitted with a fridge, microwave, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. At the hotel the rooms include bed linen and towels. GLANZ KEI Kyoto Station provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Languages spoken at the reception include English, Japanese, Korean and Filipino, and guests are invited to request advice on the area when needed. Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall is 3.2 km from the accommodation, while Fushimi Inari Taisha Shrine is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 42 km from GLANZ KEI Kyoto Station.

name: Hotel Mondonce Kyoto Gojo
description: Hotel MONDONCE Kyoto Gojo provides accommodation within 1.5 km of the centre of Kyoto, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. Fitted with a balcony, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bidet and a hair dryer. Kitchenware and kettle are also provided. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include TKP Garden City Kyoto, Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall and Gion Shijo Station. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 45 km from Hotel MONDONCE Kyoto Gojo.

name: Toyoko Inn Kyoto Shijo Karasuma
description: The 2.5-star Toyoko Inn Kyoto Shijo-Karasuma offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Kyoto. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, dry cleaning, elevator, vending machine are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating, wake-up service. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Toyoko Inn Kyoto Shijo-Karasuma is an excellent choice from which to explore Kyoto or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: Connect Inn Shichijokamogawa
description: Connect inn Shichijo-Kamogawa has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Kyoto, 700 metres from Sanjusangen-do Temple, 1.2 km from TKP Garden City Kyoto and 1.4 km from Kyoto Station. The apartment offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries and bath. There is also a kitchen in some of the units equipped with a stovetop. Kiyomizu-dera Temple is 2.2 km from Connect inn Shichijo-Kamogawa, while Gion Shijo Station is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 44 km from the accommodation.

name: Hyatt Place Kyoto
description: Hyatt Place KYOTO, locating center of Kyoto, offers modern and classic Japanese experience with historical attractions nearby. Our hotel has direct access to Marutamachi station on city subway line, and Kyoto Imperial Palace and Nijo-jo Castle locates within walking distance from our hotel.Hyatt

name: Eph Kyoto
description: Attractively set in the centre of Kyoto, eph KYOTO features buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The property is non-smoking and is situated 800 metres from TKP Garden City Kyoto. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Certain rooms come with a kitchenette with a stovetop. At eph KYOTO rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Kyoto Station, Sanjusangen-do Temple and Tofuku-ji Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 43 km from eph KYOTO.

name: Resi Stay Mayu Grace Hotel
description: Attractively situated in the Nakagyo Ward district of Kyoto, RESI STAY Mayu Grace Hotel is situated 700 metres from Kyoto International Manga Museum, 1.2 km from Nijo Castle and 2.3 km from Samurai Kembu Kyoto. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a shared lounge and free WiFi. The property is 3.2 km from Kyoto Imperial Palace and 3.3 km from TKP Garden City Kyoto. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a microwave, a fridge, a kettle, a bidet, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel rooms have a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Shoren-in Temple is 3.1 km from the accommodation, while Heian Shrine is 3.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 38 km from RESI STAY Mayu Grace Hotel.

name: Kyoto Uraraka Guest House
description: Located a 10-minute walk from Nijo Castle, Kyoto Uraraka House offers private cosy guest rooms with private bathroom and free WiFi access. Guests can visit Kinkakuji Temple, Kiyomizu Temple, the Arashiyama area and the Gion and Shijo Kawaramachi areas by bus from Marutamachi Chiekoin Bus Stop, which is a 1-minute walk away. JR Kyoto Station can be reached within a 17-minute drive. Air-conditioned rooms are simply furnished in natural colors and equipped with a fridge, a flat-screen TV, a working desk and a balcony. The en suite bathroom comes with a bath, a hairdryer and towels. The Uraraka House offers a limited number of free rental bicycle upon request, as well as daily cleaning service. There is a coin launderette on site. There is no restaurant at the property.

name: Stay Sakura Kyoto Shijo Karasuma
description: Stay SAKURA Kyoto Shijo Karasuma offers accommodation within 700 metres of the centre of Kyoto, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. All units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, washing machine and kettle. There is a private bathroom with bidet in every unit, along with slippers, a hair dryer and free toiletries. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall, Kyoto International Manga Museum and Gion Shijo Station. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 44 km from Stay SAKURA Kyoto Shijo Karasuma.

name: Gozan Hotel & Serviced Apartment Higashiyama Sanjo
description: Located a few steps from Samurai Kembu Kyoto, Gozan Hotel & Serviced Apartment Higashiyama Sanjo in Kyoto provides modern machiya-themed rooms with air conditioning and free WiFi throughout the property. Built in 2017, the 4-star property is within 15 minutes walk from Heian Shrine and a convenient 11 minutes walk from Gion District. Kyoto Station is 18 minutes away by train, while Sanjo Station is just a 5-minute walk from this hotel. The units are fitted with a flat-screen TV, fully equipped kitchenette including electric kettle, microwave and toaster, while select rooms come with a balcony. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom including a high-tech toilet, hairdryer and free toiletries. Yukata robes are provided in all rooms. Certain rooms feature a sofa bed and washing machine, while all rooms feature ironing facilities. Guests will find a free luggage storage service at the 24-hour front desk. Speaking English and Japanese, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception. A breakfast is available daily at the property. The on-site cafe and bar offers guests a relaxing area to gather. A variety of restaurants are available within a 10-minute walk from the property. Kiyomizu-dera Temple is a 20-minute walk and bus ride away. Eikan-do Zenrin-ji is a 17-minute bus ride away, while Nijo Castle is an 18-minute train ride away from Gozan Hotel & Serviced Apartment Higashiyama Sanjo. Kyoto International Manga Museum is a 20-minute walk away. Osaka Itami Airport is a 60-minute drive from Gozan Hotel & Serviced Apartment Higashiyama Sanjo.

name: Hotel Nikko Princess Kyoto
description: Receiving 3 black pavilions for five consecutive years on the 2014 to 2018 Michelin Guides, Hotel Nikko Princess Kyoto is a 3-minute walk from Exit 5 of Shijo Subway Station. This 5-star hotel offers a beauty salon, 5 dining options and property-wide free WiFi service. Guestrooms offer spacious European interiors with modern furnishings. Each room is equipped with an air purifier/humidifier, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. A mini-fridge, an electric kettle and nightwear is provided. Guests can refresh in spacious bathtub in the contemporary en suite bathroom. A buffet featuring 70 different breakfast items is available at the Café Restaurant Amber Court in the mornings. Tempura dishes and Japanese meals are available at Sagano, while Chinese cuisines are served at Hisuien. Teppanyaki grills are offered at Hoen restaurant. Guests can enjoy a massage or spa treatment at the beauty salon. Traditional crafts from Kyoto can be purchased from the souvenir shop on site. Tourist information and various services are offered at the concierge desk. Princess Kyoto Nikko Hotel is a 15-minute drive from Nijo Castle and Kiyomizu-dera Temple. The Minamiza Kabuki Theatre is a 20-minute walk and Nishiki food market street is a 7-minute walk away.

The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. description: Open from July 2016, M's Inn Higashiyama is located a 8-minute walk from Gion Shijo Station and Kiyomizu Gojo Station. It features rooms decorated in bright colours with modern furnishing. Free WiFi is available. All rooms are fitted with a washing machine, microwave and an electric kettle. Slippers, free toiletreis and a hairdryer is equipped in the en suite bathroom. Some units include a seating area where you can relax. Kawaramachi Station is a 10-minute walk away while Kiyomizu-dera Temple is 10 minutes by car. Kyoto International Manga Museum is 1.7 km from M's Inn Higashiyama, while Heian Shrine is 2.1 km away. Osaka Itami Airport is 39 km from the property.

name: Framboise Kyoto Hotel De Charme
description: Well located in the centre of Kyoto, Framboise KYOTO Hotel de charme is within 1.7 km of TKP Garden City Kyoto and 1.7 km of Tofuku-ji Temple. The property is around 3.2 km from Kiyomizu-dera Temple, 4.2 km from Gion Shijo Station and 4.2 km from Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall. The accommodation provides a shared lounge, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a fridge, a microwave, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a wardrobe. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hotel also offer free WiFi. At Framboise KYOTO Hotel de charme each room comes with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sanjusangen-do Temple, Kyoto Station and Fushimi Inari Taisha Shrine. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 42 km from Framboise KYOTO Hotel de charme.

All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with slippers, bidet, bath and shower. Kitchenware and kettle are also featured. Guests can also relax in the garden. Popular points of interest near the holiday home include TKP Garden City Kyoto, Tofuku-ji Temple and Kyoto Station. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 42 km from Kanade Kujoaketachobettei.

name: Hakuto
description: Located in the city center, this welcoming vacation home lets you experience it all in Kyoto. Your feet will make short work of the 7-minute walk to Tofuku-ji Temple or the 11-minute walk to Kyoto National Museum. Check out other neighborhoods and see more of Kyoto by hopping on a metro at Tofukuji Station, just 5 minutes away by foot. This 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental features air conditioning and a desk. Connect to the free WiFi, or get cozy in front of the flat-screen TV. In addition, there's a deep soaking tub, along with free toiletries, a bidet, and towels. The kitchen is equipped with a stovetop, a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, and a freezer, as well as a coffee maker, an electric kettle, and a microwave. And you won't have to pack extra clothes, because you'll also have access to laundry facilities. Other amenities include bed sheets, an ironing board, housekeeping, and heating.Expedia

name: Tsumugi Gionshirakawa
description: Located in Kyoto, this welcoming vacation home brings it all within your reach. Yasaka Shrine and Shijo Street are just a short walk away. Check out other neighborhoods and see more of Kyoto by hopping on a metro at either Higashiyama Station, a short 6-minute walk away, or Sanjo Keihan Station, 7 minutes away. This vacation rental features a pillowtop bed, a down comforter, climate-controlled air-conditioning, and blackout drapes/curtains. Connect to the free WiFi, or get cozy in front of the flat-screen TV. You can also use the hydromassage showerhead, plus other bathroom amenities like free toiletries, a bidet, and towels. The kitchenette is equipped with a stovetop, a freezer, and a refrigerator, as well as a microwave, cookware, and a griddle. And you can even travel light because you'll have access to laundry facilities. Other amenities include bed sheets, multilingual staff, and climate-controlled heating.Expedia

name: Shiki Suites - Kyoto Umekoji
description: Conveniently set in the Shimogyo Ward district of Kyoto, Shiki Suites - Kyoto Umekoji is located 1 km from TKP Garden City Kyoto, 2.3 km from Sanjusangen-do Temple and 2.4 km from Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is 2.2 km from the city centre and 800 metres from Kyoto Station. All rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and a hairdryer, all units at Shiki Suites - Kyoto Umekoji have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms have a terrace. At the accommodation each room includes bed linen and towels. Kyoto International Manga Museum is 3.7 km from Shiki Suites - Kyoto Umekoji, while Nijo Castle is 3.9 km away. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 42 km from the hotel.

name: Ben's Guesthouse Kyoto
description: Offering free WiFi throughout, Ben's Guesthouse Kyoto is set in Kyoto. The property is located an 8-minute walk from Kitano Tenmangu Shrine and 1.6 km from Nijo Castle. Kinkaku-ji Temple is 1.7 km away. All units comes with air conditioning, a microwave, fridge, kettle and stovetop. The private bathroom is equipped with a bath, towels, free toiletries and hair dryer. Imperial Palace is 2.1 km from the accommodation, while Kyoto International Manga Museum is 2.6 km away. Itami Airport is 38 km from the property.

name: Mu Ju Rin Hotel
description: Situated in the city center, this welcoming villa brings all of Kyoto within your reach. Kyoto International Exhibition Hall is just steps away while Heian Shrine is an easy 8-minute walk away. Check out other neighborhoods and see more of Kyoto by hopping on a metro at either Higashiyama Station, a short 9-minute walk away, or Sanjo Keihan Station, 10 minutes away. As you settle into the place, you'll find air conditioning and multilingual staff. Connect to the free WiFi, or get cozy in front of the digital TV. Bathroom amenities include a toilet with electronic bidet, free toiletries, and towels. The kitchenette is equipped with a freezer and a refrigerator, as well as an electric kettle, a microwave, and cookware. And you won't have to pack extra clothes, because you'll also have access to laundry facilities. Other amenities include bed sheets, heating, and a dining table.Expedia

name: Floral Green Maple House
description: Situated in Kyoto, 2 km from Nijo Castle, Floral Green Maple House provides free WiFi and city views. The accommodation features a hot tub. Every unit has a private bathroom and bath, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a microwave. Some units also have a kitchenette equipped with a fridge. Kyoto International Manga Museum is 2.8 km from the aparthotel. Itami Airport is 36 km away.

name: Bright Hotel Kiyomizu
description: Set in Kyoto, near Sanjusangen-do Temple, Kiyomizu-dera Temple and Gion Shijo Station, Bright Hotel Kiyomizu features free WiFi. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bidet, slippers and a hair dryer. A microwave, a fridge and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a kettle. TKP Garden City Kyoto is 2 km from the aparthotel, while Samurai Kembu Kyoto is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 45 km from Bright Hotel Kiyomizu.

name: Mimaru Suites Kyoto Shijo
description: Located in the Shimogyo Ward district in Kyoto, MIMARU SUITES KYOTO SHIJO offers 4-star rooms with free WiFi. The property is situated 1.8 km from Kyoto Station, 2.3 km from Sanjusangen-do Temple and 2.5 km from Kiyomizu-dera Temple. The property is 300 metres from Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall, and within 1.1 km of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At MIMARU SUITES KYOTO SHIJO each room comes with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Kyoto International Manga Museum, TKP Garden City Kyoto and Gion Shijo Station. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 44 km from MIMARU SUITES KYOTO SHIJO.

name: The Machiya Ebisuya
description: No description found

name: Kagan Hotel & Hostel
description: Attractively set in the centre of Kyoto, Kagan Hotel & Hostel is within 2.1 km of Kyoto Station and 2.2 km of TKP Garden City Kyoto. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking is available on site. Rooms are fitted with a coffee machine, while certain rooms come with a kitchenette with a fridge, a microwave and a toaster. Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall is 3.1 km from the hostel, while Sanjusangen-do Temple is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 43 km from Kagan Hotel & Hostel.

name: Mimaru Kyoto Station
description: Attractively set in the Shimogyo Ward district of Kyoto, MIMARU KYOTO STATION is situated less than 1 km from Kyoto Station, a 17-minute walk from Sanjusangen-do Temple and 2.9 km from Gion Shijo Station. The property is around 3 km from Kiyomizu-dera Temple, 3.1 km from Tofuku-ji Temple and 3.2 km from Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall. The property is 700 metres from TKP Garden City Kyoto, and within 2.6 km of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while certain rooms come with a terrace. At MIMARU KYOTO STATION rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Kyoto International Manga Museum is 3.5 km from the accommodation, while Fushimi Inari Taisha Shrine is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 43 km from MIMARU KYOTO STATION.

name: Hotel Kado Gosho - Minami Kyoto
description: Situated conveniently in the centre of Kyoto, Hotel Kado Gosho-Minami Kyoto is within 600 metres of Kyoto International Manga Museum and 2 km of Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall. The property is set 2.2 km from Kyoto Imperial Palace, 1.3 km from Nijo Castle and 2.3 km from Heian Shrine. The hotel offers a terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Selected rooms here will provide you with a kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a stovetop. The units feature a wardrobe. Samurai Kembu Kyoto is 2.3 km from Hotel Kado Gosho-Minami Kyoto, while Gion Shijo Station is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from the accommodation.

name: Mimaru Kyoto Nijo Castle
description: Set in Kyoto, within 1.3 km of Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall and 1.4 km of Nijo Castle, MIMARU kyoto NIJO CASTLE offers free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 2.2 km from Gion Shijo Station, 2.8 km from Kyoto Station and 2.9 km from TKP Garden City Kyoto. The property is 300 metres from the city centre and 1.2 km from Kyoto International Manga Museum. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At MIMARU kyoto NIJO CASTLE the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Samurai Kembu Kyoto is 3.1 km from the accommodation, while Kyoto Imperial Palace is 3.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 45 km from MIMARU kyoto NIJO CASTLE.

name: Your Pavilion near Kinkakuji
description: Close to the boardwalk/promenade, this welcoming vacation home brings it all within reach. You'll easily make the quick 3-minute drive to Kinkaku-ji Temple or the 6-minute drive to Kyoto Imperial Palace. You can make the most of the outdoors with the garden and free bike rentals at this vacation home. As for the great indoors, you can come inside and enjoy the free WiFi, cable/satellite TV, and DVD player. A dining area, luggage storage, climate-controlled air-conditioning, and blackout drapes/curtains are featured at this 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental. You can also use the deep soaking bathtub, plus other bathroom amenities like free toiletries, a bidet, and towels. Prepare a home-cooked meal in the kitchen, complete with an oven, a stovetop, and a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, as well as a coffee maker, an electric kettle, and a microwave. And you can even travel light because you'll have access to laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Tsukimi Hotel
description: Situated in Kyoto, less than 1 km from Gion Shijo Station, TSUKIMI HOTEL features air-conditioned accommodation and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Sanjusangen-do Temple is 1.8 km away and Heian Shrine is 2.2 km from the capsule hotel. Rooms have a shared bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At the capsule hotel rooms come with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near TSUKIMI HOTEL include Samurai Kembu Kyoto, Kiyomizu-dera Temple and Shoren-in Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from the accommodation.

name: 22 Pieces
description: 22 PIECES offers rooms with free WiFi in Kyoto, in a prime location 1.8 km from Tofuku-ji Temple and 2.9 km from Kiyomizu-dera Temple. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. Kyoto International Manga Museum is 3.2 km away and Samurai Kembu Kyoto is 3.5 km from the hotel. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a private bathroom and free toiletries, and the studio with terrace rooms include a garden and the studio with living area rooms include a balcony. The units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Nijo Castle is 3.6 km from 22 PIECES. Osaka Itami Airport is 36 km away.

name: Akari Nijojo
description: Set in the centre of Kyoto, Akari Nijo-jo has well-equipped accommodation featuring free WiFi, 500 metres from Nijo Castle and 1.1 km from Kyoto International Manga Museum. Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bidet and slippers. Some units feature a terrace and/or a balcony with garden or quiet street views. Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall is 2.5 km from the aparthotel, while Kyoto Imperial Palace is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from Akari Nijo-jo.

name: Kizashi The Suite
description: Awarded 4 red pavilions by the Michelin Guide for 2 consecutive years, Kizashi The Suite 京都祇園 offers luxury accommodation right in downtown area Gion. The hotel features spa services, 24-hours concierge service and rooms with free internet. Hotel The Suite Kizashi is just a 5-minute walk from Gion Shijo Station and Yasaka Shrine. It is a less than 10-minute drive from Kiyomizu-dera Temple, Heian Jingu Shrine and the Manga Museum. The spacious suites feature a large bathroom. Amenities include an LCD TV with satellite channels, a DVD player and a minibar. The hotel houses a relaxing hot tub, and upon advance request, massage treatments can be enjoyed in the privacy of one’s suite. The hotel also provides luggage storage service. Guests can enjoy in-room dining at Kizashi The Suite 京都祇園, which serves breakfast and set dinners in the guests’ rooms upon request. A continental breakfast consisting of yogurt, salad, bread, fruits, coffee and orange juice is provided daily.

name: Gionshirakawa No Yado By Yadoru Kyoto Hanare

name: Tokyu Stay Kyoto Sakaiza Shijo-Kawaramachi
description: Set in Kyoto and with Gion Shijo Station reachable within 500 metres, Tokyu Stay Kyoto Sakaiza Shijo Kawaramachi offers concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. The property is located 2.6 km from Sanjusangen-do Temple, 2.6 km from Kiyomizu-dera Temple and 2.7 km from Heian Shrine. The property is 1.6 km from the city centre and 1.3 km from Samurai Kembu Kyoto. The units at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Tokyu Stay Kyoto Sakaiza Shijo Kawaramachi every room includes bed linen and towels. Staff at the accommodation are available to provide information at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near Tokyu Stay Kyoto Sakaiza Shijo Kawaramachi include Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall, Kyoto International Manga Museum and Shoren-in Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from the hotel.

name: Gion - Kinpyo
description: Situated in the historical district, this welcoming vacation home brings all of Kyoto within your reach. There's convenient nearby parking, so you can leave your vehicle behind and let your feet make short work of the 2-minute walk to Gion Shirakawa Area or the 12-minute walk to Kawaramachi Street. Check out other neighborhoods and see more of Kyoto by hopping on a metro at either Sanjo Keihan Station, a short 5-minute walk away, or Higashiyama Station, 8 minutes away. A down comforter, luggage storage, a safe, and climate-controlled air-conditioning are featured at this 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental. Enjoy the free WiFi, TV, and library. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer, a toilet with electronic bidet, and free toiletries. The kitchenette is equipped with a stovetop, as well as an electric kettle, a microwave, and cookware. Other amenities include bed sheets, housekeeping, heating, and change of towels on request.Expedia

name: Hotel Kiro Kyoto Station
description: This vacation apartment is a 9minute walk from the Hachijo exit of Kyoto Station It takes 15 minutes by bus or train to the popular Kawaramachi and Gion areas There is a 24hour coin laundry on the 1st floor of the facility so you can wash your clothes at any time There is a private parking lot 500 yen per night on the back of the building Please contact us for details as it is on a firstcome firstserved basis / This vacation apartment is a 9minute walk from the Hachijo exit of Kyoto Station It is 15 minutes by bus or train to the popular Kawaramachi and Gion areas There is a 24hour coin laundry on the 1st floor of the facility so you can wash your clothes at any time There is a private parking lot 1000 yen per night on the back of the building Please contact us for details as it is on a firstcome firstserved basis If you arrive earlier than the checkin time we will be For urgent inquiry, please contact Rakuten LIFULL STAY Customer Service at +81-50-5444-6619.VRBO

name: Shisei-Juku
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a refrigerator and free WiFi, as well as a flat-screen TV and a toilet with electronic bidet. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, slippers, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Kanade Fushimiinari
description: Situated in the historical district, this welcoming vacation home brings all of Kyoto within your reach. Let your feet make short work of the 11-minute walk to Tofuku-ji Temple or easily tackle the quick 3-minute drive to Fushimi Inari Shrine. If you're looking to expand your horizons and see other nearby locales, you can catch a train at either a short Fushimi-inari Station, 4-minute walk away, or Tobakaido Station, 7 minutes away. As you settle into this 1-bedroom rental, you'll find a down comforter, climate-controlled air-conditioning, a fan, and blackout drapes/curtains. Connect to the free WiFi, or get cozy in front of the flat-screen TV. In addition, there's a deep soaking tub, along with free toiletries, towels, and a toilet with electronic bidet. Prepare a home-cooked meal in the kitchenette, complete with a stovetop, a freezer, and a refrigerator, as well as a microwave and cookware. And you won't have to pack extra clothes, because you'll also have access to laundry facilities. Other amenities include bed sheets and multilingual staff.Expedia

name: Tomoya Residence Hotel Kyoto
description: Conveniently set in Kyoto, Tomoya Residence Hotel Kyoto provides a continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. Featuring a garden, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 400 metres from Kyoto International Manga Museum, 1.7 km from Samurai Kembu Kyoto and 1.8 km from Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall. The property is non-smoking and is located 2 km from Gion Shijo Station. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. All rooms are fitted with a kettle, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace and others also offer city views. At Tomoya Residence Hotel Kyoto each room has bed linen and towels. Speaking English, Japanese, Cantonese and Chinese, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area at the reception. Heian Shrine is 2.2 km from the accommodation, while Nijo Castle is 1.6 km away. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from Tomoya Residence Hotel Kyoto.

name: Kevin's Place II (Annex)
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and a refrigerator, as well as a stovetop and free WiFi. Other amenities include towels, an electric kettle, kitchenware and utensils, and luggage storage.Expedia
